DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , open-label study evaluate effect food , effect omeprazole ranitidine danoprevir co-administered ritonavir . Volunteers assign one two treatment group . Volunteers group receive oral dos danoprevir ritonavir . In addition , volunteer group 2 receive oral dos omeprazole ranitidine . The anticipated time study approximately 6 week .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate The Effects Two Different Meal Types , Omeprazole And Ranitidine On Danoprevir Pharmacokinetics When Coadministered With Ritonavir Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Adult healthy volunteer , age 18 45 year , inclusive Weight > /= 50.0 kg Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18.0 32.0 kg/m2 , inclusive Presence active chronic disease Abnormal blood pressure Abnormal rest heart rate Abnormal ECG value History clinically significant cardiovascular cerebrovascular disease Current smokers subject discontinue smoke < 6 month prior first dose study drug Positive hepatitis B , hepatitis C HIV Positive test drug abuse alcohol Positive result H. pylorus Regular use antacid , H2 blocker , proton pump inhibitor , investigational drug within 30 day first dose study medication History clinically significant gastrointestinal disease
